passive_mission.name: Night Souls
passive_mission.description: A nearby village needs help preventing Soul Wisps from wandering into their homes at night. Help Oda relocate them away from the villagers.

passive_mission.name: Monk Ransom
passive_mission.description: There have been reports of bandits taking monks hostage in a nearby cave. Help Oda investigate the cavern!

passive_mission.name: Missing Tome
passive_mission.description: Yuriel has lost his most valuable incantation book! Help him search the library so he may continue his studies.

passive_mission.name: Test Dummy
passive_mission.description: Yuriel is working on an improved spell for enhancing armor. He's asking someone to aid him with testing...

passive_mission.name: The Glowing Lake
passive_mission.description: Samael's people have sighted a strange creature swimming in the nearby lake. Help investigate the disturbance.

passive_mission.name: Aether Assassins
passive_mission.description: There have been rumors of an assassin attending Samael's upcoming ball. Help secure his palace by providing extra security.

passive_mission.name: Black Magic Market
passive_mission.description: A source has reported rare dark magic artifacts in the black markets of Luminis. Aria may have use for these...

passive_mission.name: No Questions
passive_mission.description: Aria is asking for 7 Beetle Toes, 1 bag of Bat Guano, and 5 Bloodroot leaves. She said not to ask questions...

passive_mission.name: The Best Wool
passive_mission.description: Decim burned through another sweatshirt and needs a new one, but only will wear the premium wool found Elaria.

passive_mission.name: Playing with Matches
passive_mission.description: A small village outside Karthos has 'mysteriously' caught fire. Help subdue the flames!

passive_mission.name: Titan Rampage
passive_mission.description: A Fire Titan has escaped and is rampaging through a near by market. The town is in need of our support!

passive_mission.name: In a Pinch
passive_mission.description: Tarian has requested aid to help contain a swarm of lava crabs. They have been pinching everything in sight!

passive_mission.name: Lost in Translation
passive_mission.description: Elyse has discovered an ancient text about the history of Elaria! Helping her translate may provide clues to our journey.

passive_mission.name: Woodland Medicine
passive_mission.description: Elyse has found a rare herb that can be used for pain relief. Help her gather these herbs in the Northern Woods.

passive_mission.name: Salmon Shipment
passive_mission.description: Ursurio wants you to collect a shipment of salmon from the rivers of Luminis. The denizens of the river might not enjoy the idea as much.

passive_mission.name: "Scientific" Collection
passive_mission.description: Rumors have spread about a new type of tasty fish in the oceans south of the continent. Collect some for... scientific reasons.

passive_mission.name: A Heavy Storm
passive_mission.description: A heavy storm passed through the woods near the ocean. Help clear the fallen trees and flooding.

passive_mission.name: Burning Grove
passive_mission.description: Undead have invaded the deep forests and disturbed the natural elements. Remove them and restore balance to the grove.

passive_mission.name: Elaria Dig Site
passive_mission.description: The Elaria Expedition needs an escort for their researchers. Help them travel to the new dig site.

passive_mission.name: Words of Wisdom
passive_mission.description: A friend has suggested the Elaria Captain pick up a book to read. Travel to Luminis and find a copy of 'Language and Grammar: A Beginner's Guide'

passive_mission.name: Care Package
passive_mission.description: Malchior appears to be feeling home sick. He requested you to send him some "Lomalife lite", two cups of "Perpestrulatum" and a "bag of chestnuts".

passive_mission.name: Spell Rush
passive_mission.description: Malchior suspects the mountains to the west of Karthos to be rich with Spellstones. Be the first to find them!

passive_mission.name: Lost in the Woods
passive_mission.description: A child has gone missing near the Southern Woods. Witnesses last spotted him near a known wolf den.

passive_mission.name: Crop Rotation
passive_mission.description: Farms have been having trouble keeping the woodland beasts out of their stock. Help clear the woods of creatures!

passive_mission.name: Briar Wing
passive_mission.description: An Angelic Knight has gotten her wings caught in the briar patch. She needs our help to escape.

passive_mission.name: Wing Beats
passive_mission.description: The Aether angels have started battling void minions on the edge of The Void. Lend them aid!

passive_mission.name: Grubs Potion
passive_mission.description: Raven says we need grubs to help Elyse with a very important potion. Help him search in the near by swamp!

passive_mission.name: Airship Repairs
passive_mission.description: Your airship's engine is on its last leg. Travel to the city and collect the parts needed to repair it.

passive_mission.name: Borrowing
passive_mission.description: The goblin found some abandoned valuables in a near by home! He needs help gaining entrance to the house.

passive_mission.name: Little Thief
passive_mission.description: A small Soul Wisp has been sneaking in and stealing the Goblin's goods. Set up a trap and catch the creature.

passive_mission.name: Thou Shall Not Pass
passive_mission.description: Tarian needs a brave adventurer to defeat the Orobas that has been blocking a nearby bridge. It has been attacking travelers who attempt to cross.

passive_mission.name: Stomach Pains
passive_mission.description: The Balrog has taken residence outside Karthos. This wouldn't be a problem normally, but it drank the lava lake and is passing especially potent gas.

passive_mission.name: Ocean Cries
passive_mission.description: A sailor reported hearing the cries of a small girl coming from the ocean. He hasn't returned from his investigation yet...

passive_mission.name: Rise of the Water
passive_mission.description: Mermaids have been seen placing spells on the frogs of the Luminis rivers. They started attacking the villagers, help stop them!

passive_mission.name: Baron Bad
passive_mission.description: An evil baron has been imprisoning the innocent. Sneak into his estates and free them without getting caught.

passive_mission.name: Noble Assignment
passive_mission.description: An assassination attempt has been made on a Luminis noble. They are looking to hire additional nightly guards.

passive_mission.name: Elaria Under Siege
passive_mission.description: Void Minions have appeared in the woods around the Elaria Expedition. Help the Elaria Captain defeat the monsters before they harm the researchers!

passive_mission.name: Luminis Under Siege
passive_mission.description: The city of Luminis is under attack from Void Minions. Defeat them before they hurt the civilians!

passive_mission.name: Spirit Unrest
passive_mission.description: A wraith has been seen during Aria's spell incantations. Perhaps it is someone from her past? Help her reach out to the spirit.

passive_mission.name: Graveyard Uprising
passive_mission.description: Wraiths have been heard from the graveyards near the Void. Help Aria with an incantation that can put them to rest peacefully.

passive_mission.name: Darkness Liberates
passive_mission.description: The Monstrosity has arose from The Void once more. Defeat it and make sure it does not rise again!

passive_mission.name: Dark Influence
passive_mission.description: The Void Monstrosity is spreading its influence across the continent. Bring it down and restore balance to the region

passive_mission.name: Attack of Titan
passive_mission.description: A Fire Titan has broken into the inner city of Luminis. Defeat it before it destroys everything!

passive_mission.name: Army of Chaos
passive_mission.description: A Fire Titan has gathered an army of undead near the forests of Luminis. Defeat it and disperse the army before it turns its attention on the Expedition.

passive_mission.name: Tyrant Unleashed
passive_mission.description: The maniac general that attacked Elaria is on the loose again, terrorizing a port city on the oceans near Luminis.

passive_mission.name: Salt Ruins
passive_mission.description: A disturbance has been reported in the Salt Wastes. A strange man has been breaking into ruins in search of something. Find out what they are after.

passive_mission.name: Band of Brushes
passive_mission.description: A band of skeletons has made off with some brushes used to uncover buried treasures in Elaria. Track them down!

passive_mission.name: Bone Meal
passive_mission.description: A rogue skeleton stole the main course of a banquet feast in a nearby town. We're not sure what he will do with it, but bring it back!

passive_mission.name: Tremors in the Center
passive_mission.description: The Tremor Wurm has exploded directly in the center of a town hall on the edge of The Void. Defeat it before it eats everything in sight!

passive_mission.name: One Big Tremor
passive_mission.description: A great Tremor Wurm twice the size of the one you fought in The Void has appeared in the wilderness. Defeat it before it's too late!

passive_mission.name: Homesick
passive_mission.description: Elyse is requesting special packaging so she can send a gift to her family back home. We should be able to pick up the packaging in any nearby village.

passive_mission.name: Fresh Meat
passive_mission.description: Another wave of new adventurers has landed in Arcantica and have already stumbled into the undead. Help the Ranger guide the new recruits!

passive_mission.name: Fish Out of Water
passive_mission.description: Since his ship wreck Oda has developed a fear of the sea. Perhaps a surprise boat trip will help him overcome his fears!

passive_mission.name: Rogue Skeleton
passive_mission.description: A lone skeleton has wandered into the Elaria Expedition. Find where it's hiding and take it out before it hurts someone!

passive_mission.name: Lost Shipment
passive_mission.description: The goblin lost one of his crates of Spellstones when the undead attacked! If you help him find it, he will let you keep one.

passive_mission.name: Babysitting
passive_mission.description: Dragon Tamer has asked you to watch her baby dragons while she patches up her armor. Flame retardant clothing is advised.

passive_mission.name: Under the Weather
passive_mission.description: One of Dragon Tamer's dragons is sick. She needs 1 cup molten lava, 1 large rabbit, and 5 obsidian flowers to nurse him back to health.

passive_mission.name: Race To The Finish
passive_mission.description: Dragon Tamer wants to race! She has offered you her storm dragon to compete with. Beat her in a race around the Celestial Vault!

passive_mission.name: The Midas Touch
passive_mission.description: A citizen of Luminis has trapped a Gold Incarnate in an effort to gain its riches. It's a danger to the city; safely free it before it escapes!

passive_mission.name: Gold Drops
passive_mission.description: You have found a wandering Gold Incarnate in the Celestial Vault. It has left steaming piles of riches in its wake. Carefully collect the gold it left behind!

passive_mission.name: Gold Rush
passive_mission.description: A Gold Incarnate has escaped from the Celestial Vault and is terrorizing Elaria. Stop the elemental before it causes any harm!

passive_mission.name: Doctor on Call
passive_mission.description: A sick Ice Dragon has been spotted in The Void. It seems confused and delirious. Dragon Tamer says 10 pounds of snow, 200 mint leaves, and 7 frost flowers will help bring it back to its senses.

passive_mission.name: The Winter Festival
passive_mission.description: Luminis is having a winter festival, but the lack of snow has ruined the festivities. Wrangle an Ice Dragon to help bring snow to the festival!

passive_mission.name: Some Like it A Mild Temperature
passive_mission.description: You hear rumors that a great treasure lies within a cave in Karthos. However, it's too hot for you to safely enter. Lure an Ice Dragon to the caves to help cool it down!

passive_mission.name: Wind and Fire
passive_mission.description: A Cyclone Elemental has gotten a little too friendly with a Smoldering Elemental. The results could be disastrous. Help the Lantern Guardian separate the two safely.

passive_mission.name: Words with Fiends
passive_mission.description: The Lantern Guardian is having trouble fending off intruders from the Celestial Vault. You have a book that may help him: 'Using Our Words to Find Conflict Resolution'.

passive_mission.name: Lost Light
passive_mission.description: The Lantern Guardian has lost his lantern! He is too embarrassed to ask, but he needs your help finding it.

passive_mission.name: Unwelcome Houseguest
passive_mission.description: A Lavatail Dragon has made its home on top of the airship. He's burning holes in the exterior! Safely relocate the dragon before he does anymore damage.

passive_mission.name: Good Boy
passive_mission.description: A Lavatail Dragon has become fond of you and has started following you on your adventures. He plays a bit rough; train him before he burns a hole in your armor!

passive_mission.name: Frozen Graves
passive_mission.description: An Ice Golem froze a fellow adventurerâ€™s airship solid. Lure a Lavatail Dragon to the scene to help you rescue its crew!

passive_mission.name: Harsh Winds
passive_mission.description: A Windstorm Elemental is heading towards the void. It may inadvertently spread the void corruption! Divert its course before it's too late.

passive_mission.name: Bad Hair Day
passive_mission.description: Luminis's famed 'Best Hairdo' competition is in danger of being ruined by nearby Windstorm Elementals. Divert them from the competition before they mess up any dos!

passive_mission.name: Troubled Landings
passive_mission.description: A Windstorm Elemental is traveling under a fleet of airships, trying to land on Arcantica. Lure the elemental away from the airships so they can land safely!

passive_mission.name: Singing Lessons
passive_mission.description: The Thunder Elementals have become unusually aggressive. Groc knows an ancient melody that will help soothe them.

passive_mission.name: Dark Skies
passive_mission.description: A crew of Aether bandits have started an assault on the Celestial Vault. Help Groc defend the elementals.

passive_mission.name: Thorn in My Side
passive_mission.description: Groc has had a stick stuck in his shoulder for a few millennia. Help him remove it!

passive_mission.name: Dinner Party
passive_mission.description: Tarian is trying to teach the undead some manners. Help him throw a dinner party and teach the undead to chew with their mouth closed.

passive_mission.name: A Small Gesture
passive_mission.description: Tarian would like to get a gift for Aria. Help him gather a dozen black roses and a box of chocolate covered roaches.

passive_mission.name: Sharpened Steel
passive_mission.description: Tarian's axe is getting a bit dull. Take it to the local blacksmith to get it sharpened!

passive_mission.name: Expected Results
passive_mission.description: There is a flying competition in Luminis. Samael would be disgraced if he lost to a commoner. Help him train!

passive_mission.name: Training Camp
passive_mission.description: Samael's dueling skills have gotten a little dull. A few rounds of sparring would be a great help to him.

passive_mission.name: Aetherial Gaffe
passive_mission.description: Embarrassing rumors about Samael have been spreading across Luminis. Samael is adamant that they are false. Help him dispel the rumors by finding out who started them.

passive_mission.name: Stuck in the Gears
passive_mission.description: Some debris in the engines has left an Aether ship derelict on the shores of the Seastone Citadel. They request aid. Find out what got lodged in the gears!

passive_mission.name: Sweeping the Floors
passive_mission.description: The monk of the First Order has requested aid in cleaning the Seastone Citadel. Oda begrudgingly accepted and is looking for help to make the job faster.

passive_mission.name: Birds of a Feather
passive_mission.description: A band of Avians have been thieving travelers' possessions near the Seastone Citadel. Track them down and return the stolen items they have obtained.
